channel.title: fitgreenmind TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from fitgreenmind

item.title: Veganuary 12/25 25 recipes in under 25mins: PAD KRAPOW TOFU 🇹🇭 Pad krapow is a popular dish from Thailand, usually it’s made with some sort of meat and very essential is the “holy basil”. I used tempeh, served it on rice and that’s how I like tempeh! 🥹

item.title: Sick soup 🍜 You’re sick, you’re feeling under the weather or you just want a warming meal… this soup is there for you! 🫶 RECIPE (2 servings, 15min prep time): -2 cloves garlic -2 spronions -a thumbsize piece of ginger Chop and sauté in some oil. -veggie
